definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage

sentences.english: We recommend you to use the fist way of containing only one hole to play single note.
sentences.chinese: 我们推荐使用第一种方法，口含一孔吹单音。

sentences.english: Can you recommend any perfect chocolates?
sentences.chinese: 你能推荐一些经典的巧克力吗？

sentences.english: I take pleasure in recommending to you Mr. Li Yan.
sentences.chinese: 我很高兴地向您推荐李岩先生。

sentences.english: To shorten the time, the rapid thermal burn cooking pot is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 若想缩短时间，断热烹调的焖烧锅值得推荐。

sentences.english: But, can you recommend a competent friend.
sentences.chinese: 但，可以向你推荐一位有能力的朋友。

sentences.english: Of course, there are many other recommended classic song.
sentences.chinese: 当然，其他也有不少值得推荐的经典之曲。

sentences.english: If there are no contraindications , LT should be recommended to patients.
sentences.chinese: 在无禁忌症的情况下，可推荐患者行LT。

sentences.english: Many of our picks also share Tinley Park's family-friendly atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 很多我们的推荐也同样有家庭友好的气氛。

sentences.english: Take them back and exchange them for another recommended pair of running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 把他们拿回去，拿他们换另外一双推荐的跑步鞋。

sentences.english: You don't want to inhale it, it's definitely not recommended.
sentences.chinese: 你不会想要把它吸入体内的，这是绝对不推荐的。

sentences.english: Hereby I would sincerely recommend this highly-talented student to your institution.
sentences.chinese: 在此我郑重的向贵校推荐这位才华出众的学生。

sentences.english: We recommend continuance of this program.
sentences.chinese: 我们推荐的延续，这一计划。

sentences.english: So, collaboratively filter and recommend or die?
sentences.chinese: 那么，协同过滤和推荐会消失？

sentences.english: I have no idea. Can you please?
Acouple of months ago a friend asked if I'd write her a job reference.
sentences.chinese: 几个月前，一位朋友问我是否能帮她写封求职推荐信。

sentences.english: I will send more details to you once I see your references.
sentences.chinese: 我将派遣更多的细节，你一次我看见你的推荐。

definition: to regard as the foremost/to name as a prime example/to implement for the first time
first choice/premium/to come first in the imperial examinations
sentence-final particle that conveys informality, warmth, friendliness or intimacy/may also indicate that one is stating a fact that the other person is not aware of
oh (interjection indicating that one has just learned sth)
to comment/a point by point commentary
carefully chosen/handpicked/best of the bunch/choice (product)/concentration (mining)/to concentrate/to winnow
